-	itemshop	cima#1	-1,7773,5278:500,5375:500,5526:500,5550:500,18555:500,5480:500,5423:500,5467:500,5003:500,18600:500,5564:500,5690:500,5383:500,5292:500,5146:500,5373:500,5660:500,5374:500,5518:500,5013:500,5451:500,5452:500,5366:500,5506:500,5094:500,5658:500,5141:500,5780:500,5137:500,5170:500,5306:500,5039:500,5029:500,5025:500,5293:500,5064:500,5117:500,5110:500,5069:500,5061:500,5079:500
-	itemshop	meio#2	-1,7773,5176:500,5314:500,5102:500,5325:500,5389:500,5800:500,5664:500,5471:500,5517:500,5121:500,5358:500,2286:500
-	itemshop	baixo#3	-1,7773,5846:500,5377:500,5206:500,5574:500,5445:500,18521:500,5403:500,18505:500,5361:500,5594:500,5775:500,5107:500,5532:500
prontera,186,218,4	script	Loja Campal (ROPs)#bg	674,{
	switch( select("^00CC00•^000000 ROPs Cabeça ^00CC00(Topo).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 ROPs Cabeça ^00CC00(Meio).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 ROPs Cabeça ^00CC00(Baixo).^000000","^00CC00•^000000 Saír.") ){
		case 1: callshop "cima#1", 0; end;
		case 2: callshop "meio#2", 0; end;
		case 3: callshop "baixo#3", 0; end;	
		case 4: close;
		}
}
